Reviews.Title: I JUST  LOVE  IT.
Reviews.Author: wounderfullthings
Reviews.Content: VERY  VERY  CLEAR  PICTURE, WELL  WELL  THE  MONEY,  SO  STOP  JUST  LOOKING  AT  THIS  ITEM  BUY  IT  ALREADY YOU  WON'T  BE  SORRY.  S.DAVIS  NYC.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.5" wide screen LED backlit monitor
HDMI, BNC1 & BNC2, VGA inputs
BNC2 loop output
3D comb filter with de-interlace & noise reduction function
Built in stereo speakers
Plastic frame
Remote control included
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security 18.5" Professional CCTV Security Camera LED Monitor with 2x BNC, HDMI and VGA Inputs; 1x BNC Loop Output - Remote Control Included for Easy Switching to Different Input Sources
